name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.outputParserStructured
semantic_context: Return data in a defined JSON format

notice.displayName: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead
notice.name: notice

schemaType.name: schemaType

options.name: Generate From JSON Example
options.description: Generate a schema from an example JSON object

schemaType.description: How to specify the schema for the function
schemaType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsonSchemaExample.name: jsonSchemaExample
jsonSchemaExample.description: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema
jsonSchemaExample.ai_hint: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema

inputSchema.name: inputSchema
inputSchema.description: Schema to use for the function
inputSchema.hint: Use JSON Schema format (examples). $refs syntax is currently not supported.
inputSchema.ai_hint: Schema to use for the function

jsonSchema.name: jsonSchema
jsonSchema.description: JSON Schema to structure and validate the output against
jsonSchema.ai_hint: JSON Schema to structure and validate the output against

autoFix.description: Whether to automatically fix the output when it is not in the correct format. Will cause another LLM call.
autoFix.name: autoFix

customizeRetryPrompt.name: customizeRetryPrompt
customizeRetryPrompt.description: Whether to customize the prompt used for retrying the output parsing. If disabled, a default prompt will be used.

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.default:
Instructions:
--------------
{instructions}
--------------
Completion:
--------------
{completion}
--------------

Above, the Completion did not satisfy the constraints given in the Instructions.
Error:
--------------
{error}
--------------

Please try again. Please only respond with an answer that satisfies the constraints laid out in the Instructions:
prompt.description: Prompt template used for fixing the output. Uses placeholders: "{instructions}" for parsing rules, "{completion}" for the failed attempt, and "{error}" for the validation error message.
prompt.ai_hint: Prompt template used for fixing the output. Uses placeholders: "{instructions}" for parsing rules, "{completion}" for the failed attempt, and "{error}" for the validation error message.

conditional_rules: IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.3}} AND schemaType == 'fromJson' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF autoFix == True THEN SHOW parameter 'customizeRetryPrompt'
IF autoFix == True AND customizeRetryPrompt == True THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
